concept.title: Dynamic Buffers Example Code
concept.shortdesc: The example shows how dynamic arrays are constructed and used.

section.title: DynamicBuffers: using dynamic buffers
section.p: Click on the following link to download the example: DynamicBuffers.zip
Download some additional files required by the example: CommonFramework.zip.
View the source code: browse. View the additional files: browse.
The example shows a number of operations on a flat dynamic buffer and a segmented dynamic buffer.

li.p: CBufFlat - Provides a flat storage dynamic buffer.
CBufSeg - Provides a segmented dynamic buffer.

section.p: The example requires no specific capabilities in order to run - and does not demonstrate any security issues.
